author: regisxu
msg: override all set socket option mehtods in SocketAdapter
default implementation in Socket will recreate fd if Socket.isCreated is false
(it's private field, and always false in this case), so the following write
operation will write to invalided fd and throw SocketException.

author: fhanik
msg: When using the fair queue, use a much more efficient idle connection handling by using a FILO queue
so that connections are reused properly

author: sharad
msg: AVRO-5. Add java versus python RPC interoperability tests.

author: sharad
msg: AVRO-13. Use dictionary instead of if-else in validate.

author: fhanik
msg: JMX needs to be handled a bit differently. Random object names are not all that great.
In this way, one can control the JMX registration completely from the outside.
